props.name: day
props.description: The value of the day input. In most cases you should use `v-model:day` instead of setting this prop directly.

props.name: month
props.description: The value of the month input. In most cases you should use `v-model:month` instead of setting this prop directly.

props.name: year
props.description: The value of the year input. In most cases you should use `v-model:year` instead of setting this prop directly.

props.name: dayHasError
props.description: If `true`, the day input will be outlined in red

props.name: monthHasError
props.description: If `true`, the month input will be outlined in red

props.name: yearHasError
props.description: If `true`, the year input will be outlined in red

props.name: autocomplete
props.description: The type of autocomplete to allow on the inputs. Currently only allows birthday.

props.name: id
props.description:
An ID for the date component. This will be used as a prefix for the IDs of the individual inputs.

If you don't provide an ID, one will be generated automatically.

props.name: namePrefix
props.description:
An optional prefix for the `name` attribute on the individual inputs. If provided, these
attributes will be set to `[prefix]-day`, `[prefix]-month` and `[prefix]-year`. If not provided,
the names will be `day`, `month`, and `year`.

props.name: formGroupClass
props.description: Classes to add to the form group. You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: fieldsetDescribedBy
props.description: One or more element IDs to add to the `aria-describedby` attribute, used to provide additional descriptive information for screenreader users.

props.name: fieldsetClass
props.description: Classes to add to the fieldset container. You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: fieldsetRole
props.description: Optional ARIA role attribute to add to the fieldset container.

props.name: legend
props.description: Text to use within the legend. If content is provided in the `legend` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: legendClass
props.description: Classes to add to the legend. You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: legendIsPageHeading
props.description: Whether the legend also acts as the heading for the page.

props.name: hint
props.description: Text to use within the hint. If content is provided in the `hint` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: hintClass
props.description: Classes to add to the hint span tag. You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: errorMessage
props.description: Text to use within the error message. If content is provided in the `error-message` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: errorMessageClass
props.description:
Classes to add to the error message `

` tag. You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: errorMessageVisuallyHiddenText
props.description:
A visually hidden prefix used before the error message.

Defaults to `'Error'`.

slots.name: legend
slots.description: The content of the legend. If content is provided in this slot, the `legend` prop will be ignored.

slots.name: hint
slots.description: The content of the hint. If content is provided in this slot, the `hint` prop will be ignored.

slots.name: error-message
slots.description: The content of the error message. If content is provided in this slot, the `errorMessage` prop will be ignored.
